item.title: 美联储生产力问题顶级专家认为有理由保持乐观
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行一位以研究生产率趋势而闻名的经济顾问周一发表了一份分析报告，认为近期生产率的飙升不一定会像过去那样消退。【原文：An economic adviser at the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco known for his research into productivity trends published an analysis Monday that left open the possibility that a recent surge in productivity may not necessarily fade as it so often has in the past.】

item.title: 报告称美国 11 月轻型汽车销量将增长 6
item.description: 汽车数据公司 S&P Global Mobility 周一表示，预计 11 月份美国轻型汽车销量将同比增长 6%。【原文：Automotive data firm S&P Global Mobility said on Monday it expects U.S. light vehicle sales to be up 6% in November from a year ago.】

item.title: 纳格尔：德国陷入经济疲软，但降息应循序渐进
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）周一表示，德国正处于经济疲软期，但央行利率只需逐步下调，以确保完全消除通胀压力。【原文：Germany is stuck in a period of economic weakness but central bank interest rates need to come down only gradually to make sure inflationary pressures are fully extinguished, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said on Monday.】

item.title: 曼哈顿最高联邦检察官达米安-威廉姆斯将在特朗普就职典礼前辞职
item.description: 曼哈顿最高联邦检察官达米安-威廉姆斯（Damian Williams）周一表示，他计划在12月13日，即当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职前一个月辞职。【原文：Damian Williams, the top federal prosecutor in Manhattan, said on Monday he planned to resign on Dec. 13, about a month before President-elect Donald Trump is inaugurated.】

item.title: UniCredit-Banco BPM 的组合会是什么样子？
item.description: 意大利第三大银行 Banco BPM 自 2021 年上任以来，一直是意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官兼资深交易商 Andrea Orcel 的愿望清单。【原文：Italy's third-largest bank Banco BPM has been on UniCredit CEO and veteran dealmaker Andrea Orcel's wish list since he took up his current role in 2021.】

item.title: 赢得国防合同后，英特尔预计美国拨款将减少
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，英特尔预计美国对这家芯片制造商的初步补贴计划将在85亿美元的基础上略有减少。【原文：Intel expects a small reduction from the $8.5 billion preliminary U.S. subsidies planned for the chipmaker, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉在 2023 年积累了大量温室气体排放信用额度，而其他汽车制造商却落在后面
item.description: 在 2023 车型年，特斯拉通过销售电动汽车产生了近 3400 万公吨的温室气体信用额度，而面对更严格的排放标准，汽车行业的信用额度缺口巨大。【原文：Tesla generated nearly 34 million metric tons of greenhouse gas credits in the 2023 model year by selling electric vehicles, as the auto industry racked up significant credit deficits in the face of more stringent emissions standards.】

item.title: 美国最高法院询问司法部对考克斯通信案的看法
item.description: 美国最高法院周一要求司法部就大法官是否应审查考克斯通讯公司 [RIC:RIC:COXC.UL] 与一组音乐唱片公司之间的版权纠纷进行权衡，因为此前的一项司法判决驳回了陪审团对互联网服务提供商考克斯公司客户涉嫌盗版音乐而做出的 10 亿美元的裁决。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court asked the Justice Department on Monday to weigh in on whether the justices should review a copyright dispute between Cox Communications [RIC:RIC:COXC.UL] and a group of music labels following a judicial decision that threw out a $1 billion jury verdict against the internet service provider over alleged piracy of music by Cox customers.】

item.title: 意大利政界人士对意大利联合信贷银行竞购 BPM 银行表示担忧
item.description: 意大利经济部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利保留对联合信贷银行收购 Banco BPM 的计划使用旨在保护战略资产的金权法的权利。【原文：Italy reserves the right to use its golden power legislation aimed at shielding strategic assets on UniCredit's plans to take over Banco BPM , Economy Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: 官员称欧盟尚未与中国就电动汽车关税达成协议
item.description: 欧洲官员周一表示，欧盟和中国官员正在讨论欧洲对中国电动汽车（EV）征收关税的替代方案，包括中国电动汽车在欧洲销售的最低价格，但目前还没有任何解决方案。【原文：European Union and Chinese officials are discussing alternatives to European tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles (EV), including minimum prices at which such cars could be sold in Europe, but no solution is imminent, European officials said on Monday.】

item.title: 白宫称拜登政策吸引了 1 万亿美元的美国经济投资
item.description: 白宫周一表示，在拜登政府执政期间，企业承诺在半导体和清洁能源等美国产业投资超过1万亿美元，并列举了近年来通过的三项重要法律。【原文：Companies have pledged to invest more than $1 trillion in U.S. industries such as semiconductors and clean energy during the Biden administration, the White House said on Monday, citing the passage of three critical laws in recent years.】

item.title: Unifor 的加拿大国家铁路公司成员投票支持罢工授权
item.description: Unifor 周一表示，如果加拿大国家铁路公司（Canadian National Railway）与工会双方未能在 1 月 1 日前达成协议，工会成员已授权该公司采取罢工行动。【原文：Unifor said on Monday its members at Canadian National Railway have authorized a strike action at the railroad if the parties fail to reach an agreement by Jan. 1.】

item.title: 欧盟称蓝天公司违反信息披露规定
item.description: 欧盟委员会发言人在周一的每日简报会上告诉记者，发展迅速的社交媒体平台 Bluesky 因未能披露重要细节而违反了欧盟法规。【原文：Bluesky, the rapidly growing social media platform, is violating EU regulations by failing to disclose important details, a European Commission spokesperson told reporters during a daily briefing on Monday.】

item.title: 英伟达展示可修改声音、生成新奇声音的人工智能模型
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）周一展示了一种用于生成音乐和音频的新型人工智能模型，它可以修改声音并生成新奇的声音，这项技术主要面向音乐、电影和视频游戏的制作者。【原文：Nvidia on Monday showed a new artificial intelligence model for generating music and audio that can modify voices and generate novel sounds - technology aimed at the producers of music, films and video games.】

item.title: 巴菲特完善财富计划，捐赠更多伯克希尔股份
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）为死后捐献财产做了进一步的准备。【原文：Warren Buffett has made further preparations for donating his fortune after his death.】

item.title: 百安居所有者翠丰公司（Kingfisher）提前发货，为圣诞节备足了货品
item.description: B&Q 和 Castorama 的所有者 Kingfisher 表示，由于采取了提前建立库存以降低供应链中断风险的策略，该公司的圣诞产品库存充足。【原文：B&Q and Castorama owner Kingfisher said it was well stocked with Christmas products, thanks to a strategy of building up inventory early to mitigate the risk of supply chain disruption.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，花旗集团为数百人发放特别留用奖金
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，花旗集团今年为数百名员工发放了特别留用奖金，因为这家华尔街巨头希望防止更多银行家离职。【原文：Citigroup has greenlit special retention bonuses for hundreds of personnel this year as the Wall Street giant looks to prevent more bankers from leaving, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 预测假日需求强劲，全年销售额降幅较小
item.description: Bath & Body Works 周一上调了对全年调整后利润的预期，并表示，受个人护理产品需求稳定和店内新产品的帮助，预计全年销售额的降幅将较小，这使得该零售商的股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 12%。【原文：Bath & Body Works on Monday raised its forecast for full-year adjusted profit and said it expects a smaller drop in annual sales, helped by steadfast demand for its personal care products and new offerings in its stores, sending the retailer's shares up about 12% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 消息人士称，大众汽车对 Northvolt 股份进行了大幅减值
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，大众汽车（Northvolt 的第一大股东）已大幅减持其在这家瑞典电池制造商（上周已在美国申请破产保护）所持有的 21% 股份。【原文：Volkswagen , Northvolt's top shareholder, has significantly written down its 21% stake in the Swedish battery cells maker that filed for bankruptcy protection in the United States last week, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 本周数据密集，多伦多证券交易所期货上涨
item.description: 与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周一上涨，受到华尔街同行的影响，而投资者则期待着本周充满关键的国内和美国经济数据。【原文：Futures tied to Canada's main stock index rose on Monday, taking cues from Wall Street peers, while investors looked ahead to a week filled with crucial domestic and U.S. economic data.】

item.title: 梅西百货季度净销售额不及预期
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周一公布的初步财报显示，该公司第三季度销售额不及华尔街预期，原因是大幅促销活动未能吸引那些对购物持选择性态度的顾客。【原文：Macy's on Monday missed Wall Street expectations for third -quarter sales in its preliminary results, as steep promotions failed to attract customers who have turned selective on purchases.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行将 2025 年标准普尔 500 指数预期从 6,500 点上调至 6,600 点
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）周一将 2025 年 S&P 500 指数的预测值从 6500 点上调至 6600 点，原因是美国经济具有活力，通胀率逐步下降，巨型科技股的潜在盈利增长强劲。【原文：Barclays raised its 2025 forecast for the S&P 500 index on Monday to 6,600 from 6,500, on the back of a resilient U.S. economy, gradual decrease in inflation and robust potential earnings growth of mega-cap technology stocks.】

item.title: 百合花的陨落凸显了空中出租车的资金紧张问题
item.description: 本月，德国的 Lilium 公司因现金危机而倒闭，使西方第一家载客空中出租车公司的竞争失去了一个引人注目的竞争对手，这使新兴行业面临的一个主要障碍成为新的焦点。【原文：The race to become the first Western air-taxi company to carry passengers lost a high-profile competitor this month when Germany's Lilium succumbed to a cash crisis, throwing a fresh spotlight on a major hurdle for the fledgling industry.】

item.title: 印尼称苹果公司 1 亿美元的投资方案不够充分
item.description: 印度尼西亚工业部周一表示，苹果公司提出的投资 1 亿美元建设配件和组件工厂的建议不足以让印尼允许这家科技巨头销售其最新款 iPhone。【原文：Indonesia said a $100 million investment proposal from Apple to build an accessory and component plant was not enough for the country to allow the tech giant to sell its latest iPhone model, its industry ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：国债因贝森特的选择而反弹，美元回落
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 中央银行称泰国银行系统流动性严重过剩
item.description: 泰国一位助理行长周一表示，泰国银行系统流动性严重过剩，而央行并未加强贷款监管，这反映出银行不愿放贷。【原文：Thailand's banking system has large excess liquidity and the central bank has not tightened its lending supervision, an assistant governor said on Monday, reflecting banks' reluctance to lend.】

item.title: 美国首席执行官向员工保证，道明银行准备聘请合规监督员
item.description: 据两位熟悉情况的消息人士透露，道明银行正准备安装美国政府下令安装的监控器，并已采取行动向员工保证，道明银行有足够的资源来遵守禁止洗钱的法律。【原文：TD Bank is preparing to install U.S. government-ordered monitors and has moved to reassure employees that it had enough resources to comply with laws prohibiting money laundering, according to two sources familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 特朗普的大型减税计划可能因债券市场的谨慎而放缓
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的共和党人承诺在明年完全控制美国国会后将加大油门，几乎没有什么能阻止他们执行当选总统削减税收和重整全球贸易格局的承诺。【原文：Donald Trump's Republicans are promising to hit the gas next year when they assume full control of the U.S. Congress, with little to stop them from executing the president-elect's promises to slash taxes and reorder the global trade landscape.】

item.title: 聚焦：投资者挖掘新数据，预测零售商业绩
item.description: 在一些人预计会令人失望的节假日来临之际，高盛等华尔街投资者正在使用新的方法来监控购物者的行动和意图，以帮助确定本季度的赢家和输家。【原文：Heading into holidays some expect to disappoint, Wall Street investors like Goldman Sachs are using new ways to monitor shoppers' actions and intentions to help determine the season's winners and losers.】

item.title: 圭亚那选择美国新创公司开采巨大天然气储量面临障碍
item.description: 圭亚那选择了一家名不见经传的美国初创公司来设计和开发项目，使其尚未开发的大量天然气资源货币化，而这些项目的成本可能高达 300 亿美元。 成立一年之久的 Fulcrum LNG 公司面临着融资障碍，这可能会影响它的选择。最终，这个南美国家可能会依赖埃克森美孚牵头的财团，该财团控制着南美所有的天然气生产。【原文：Doubts are growing over Guyana's pick of a little-known U.S. startup to craft and develop projects to monetize its vast untapped natural gas resources that could cost up to $30 billion. Year-old Fulcrum LNG faces financing hurdles that could derail its selection. Ultimately, the South American nation may end up relying on a consortium led by Exxon Mobil , which controls all the production in the】
